brand_identity.name: BeamForge
brand_identity.description: A high-precision structural engineering tool that feels like a modern cockpit. No clutter, just data and decision.

headings.usage: Use for all section titles, modal headers, and report titles. Avoid Inter.

body.usage: General UI text, labels, and instructions.

data.usage: CRITICAL: ALL numerical values, calculation results, input fields, and code snippets.

usage_rules.primary: Use ONLY for the primary 'Calculate', 'Save', or 'Generate' action. Do not overuse.
usage_rules.accent: Use for warnings, critical alerts, or highlighting a specific changed value.
usage_rules.background: The app is strictly dark mode for engineering comfort.
usage_rules.gradients: Avoid gradients on backgrounds. Use subtle gradients only on active borders (The Tracing Beam).

rules: Minimum padding for cards: p-6 or p-8
Gap between grid items: gap-6 or gap-8
Input field height: h-12 (Comfortable click targets)

dashboard.structure: Grid cols-12. Summary metrics (col-span-3), Recent Projects (col-span-6), Quick Tools (col-span-3). Dense but breathable.

design_input.structure: Left Panel (60%): Visualizer/Canvas (Fixed). Right Panel (40%): Scrollable Input Forms.
design_input.mobile: Stack: Visualizer on top (h-64), Inputs below.

reports.structure: A centered div with aspect-ratio-[210/297] (A4), white background, black text. Presented inside a dark modal or viewing pane.

buttons.style: Sharp edges or small radius (rounded-sm). Technical feel.

cards.style: Flat background (bg-card), 1px border (border-border). No drop shadows, use 'Inner Glow' or border highlight on hover.

inputs.style: bg-muted/50 border-input focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-sm font-mono text-sm

charts.style: Minimalist. Remove grid lines if possible, or make them very subtle (opacity 0.1). Use primary and accent colors for lines/bars.

visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: Use a moving gradient border effect on the 'Active' input section to guide the engineer's focus.
visual_enhancers.grid_lines: Background pattern: 20x20px grid lines with 5% opacity to resemble a blueprint.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use heavily on sticky headers and floating toolbars: backdrop-blur-xl bg-background/80 border-b border-white/5.

hero_background.description: Abstract concrete geometry, use as subtle background overlay with 90% dark tint.

login_visual.description: Engineer working on blueprints, high quality photography for login/landing side panel.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition (transition: all).
You MUST NOT center align the app container (.App { text-align: center; }).
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states.
Main agent relies on provided image URLs. Missing categories = placeholders (FORBIDDEN).
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attributes.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE src/index.css with the provided CSS variables for the 'Performance Pro' dark theme.
2. FORCE dark mode by default in the app (add 'dark' class to html/body).
3. INSTALL missing icons if needed (lucide-react is present).
4. USE Recharts for the Magnel Diagram and Shear/Moment envelopes.
5. BUILD a 'SectionSelector' component using the abstract geometry images or SVG icons.
6. ENSURE all inputs use the 'JetBrains Mono' or monospace font family.
7. IMPLEMENT the PDF generation using a hidden print-friendly view.
